sql_create_table.sql_create: create table user_info(id integer primary key autoincrement,name varchar,sex varchar,dept varchar,workgroup varchar,mobile varchar,company varchar);

create table project_info(id integer primary key autoincrement,Name varchar,WorkSpaceName varchar,Creator varchar,CteateTime varchar,UpdateTime1 varchar, BaseMapPath varchar,UpdateTime varchar,City,varchar,GroupNum varchar, SerialNum integer,CodeNum integer,GroupLocal integer,GroupLength integer,PipeLength integer);
create table app_info(id integer primary key autoincrement,app_name varchar,version_code varchar,updated_date varchar,dev_unit varchar,remark varchar);
create table point_remark(id integer primary key autoincrement,pipe_type varchar,remark varchar);
create table line_remark(id integer primary key autoincrement,pipe_type varchar,remark varchar);
create table pipe_texture(id integer primary key autoincrement,pipe_type varchar,texture varchar);
create table embedded_way(id integer primary key autoincrement,embedded_way varchar);
create table state(id integer primary key autoincrement,state varchar);
create table pipe_size(id integer primary key autoincrement,pipe_size varchar);
create table pressure(id integer primary key autoincrement,pressure varchar);
create table voltage(id integer primary key autoincrement,voltage varchar);
create table point_list(id integer primary key autoincrement,city varchar,point varchar);
create table line_list(id integer primary key autoincrement,city varchar,line varchar);
create table city_list(id integer primary key autoincrement,city varchar);
create table pipe_info(id integer primary key autoincrement, name varchar,code varchar,typename varchar,remark varchar);
create table appendant_info(id integer primary key autoincrement, name varchar,typename varchar,code varchar,IsShowFearture boolean,remark varchar);
create table feature_info(id integer primary key autoincrement, name varchar,typename varchar,code varchar,remark varchar);

create table default_point_setting(id integer primary key autoincrement,name varchar,color varchar,scaleX double,scaleY double,angle double,symbolID integer,standard varchar,minScaleVisible double,maxScaleVisible double,lineWidth double,pipe_type varchar,city varchar);
